fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Choose one person each night to Blackmail.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Blackmailed targets cannot talk, react or use abilities during the day.
- You can hear private messages.
- Can only spawn if Mafia is present, You have access to the Mafia factional chat.
- You can only spawn in Random Town slots.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Kill anyone that will not submit to the Mafia.
